Mumsum - Premium Baby Products

Nourishing massage oil with goodness of ayurveda....

Mumsum Nourishing oil is an ayurvedic proprietary medicine specially formulated to strengthen your baby’s joints through hand-picked Ayurvedic ingredients.
It can help with colic, cramps, gas, and constipation. It can help ease muscular tension, and growing pains and will stimulate growth in pre-term babies.
